SELECT A.BIN_ProductPriceSolutionID as productPriceSolutionID, A.SolutionName AS solutionName, A.SolutionCode AS solutionCode, convert(varchar(30),A.StartDate,120) AS startDate, convert(varchar(30),A.EndDate,120) AS endDate, A.Comments AS comments, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPriceSolution A WITH(NOLOCK)
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId#
(A.SolutionName LIKE '%' + #solutionName# + '%')
(A.SolutionCode LIKE '%' + #solutionCode# + '%')
A.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
